nodes.text: Kerry's statement should not be accepted as true
My opponent recently announced that he is the candidate of  conservative values  which must have come as a surprise to a lot of his supporters.
Kerry was precedently committed to be a non-conservative
Kerry is committed to be a conservative
If you say the heart and soul of America is found in Hollywood I'm afraid you are not the candidate of conservative values
Who claims that the heart of America is in Hollywood has not conservative values
If you voted against the bipartisan Defense of Marriage Act which President Clinton signed you are not the candidate of conservative values.
Who votes against a typical conservative law has not conservative values
If you gave a speech as my opponent did calling the Reagan presidency eight years of  moral darkness  then you may be a lot of things but the candidate of conservative values is not one of them.
Who claims that one of the most conservative presidencies was a moral darkness has not conservative values
